newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Roof ice kills baby in Sweden, landlord convicted.
newsitem.headline: Roof ice kills baby in Sweden, landlord convicted.

text.p: The owner of a Swedish apartment block was found guilty of negligence on Wednesday after large chunks of ice slid from the building's roof and killed a baby, the Swedish news agency TT said.
A court in the northern town of Lulea gave the man a suspended 30-day prison term over the March 1995 incident, which caused the death of a four-month-old boy lying in his pram.
He told the court he and the block's caretaker had done everything within reason to stop a build-up of ice and snow on the roof, a common problem on Swedish buildings.
